about.intro1: I am a 23 year old guy from Norway with a bachelor in digital media & design. This site is meant as a portefolio aswell as a place I can experiment with development and design.
about.intro2: My goal is to get better at front-end development and I have this autumn worked at Prios Kompetanse AS , where i have gotten to know VueJs.
about.bachelorDescription: A bachelor in digitale media and design at HIÃ˜ involves an introduction to many of the steps included in development and design of digital applications. Some of the courses I have been trough are web-development, programming, 3D-modelling and graphical design.
